alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Lamoille; Orleans; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 11:16AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lamoille, western Orleans, northeastern Chittenden and central Franklin Counties through NOON EDT... At 1115 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fletcher, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Rainfall rates of an inch per hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rain may result in ponding on roads. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jeffersonville Village around 1120 AM EDT. Fletcher around 1135 AM EDT. St. Albans Town around 1140 AM EDT. Waterville around 1155 AM EDT. Sheldon, Fairfield, Bakersfield and Belvidere Center around 1200 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Jeffersonville, Belvidere Junction, Sheldon Junction, North Underhill, West Fletcher, East Fletcher, East Fairfield, North Cambridge, Binghamville and Cambridge Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Lamoille; Orleans; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin
